name: UpdateEventOrchestrationFeatures
description:
Update features for Event Orchestration in PagerDuty.

This tool updates the enablement settings for specific product add-ons on an Event Orchestration in PagerDuty. Currently supports only the `aiops` feature. Use this to enable or disable features contained within the addon. Note: If the account lacks entitlement for AIOps, the change will occur but with a warning.

parameters.name: event_orchestration_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for an Event Orchestration to update features.

value_schema.description: The ID of an Event Orchestration.

parameters.name: feature_enablement_identifier
parameters.description: Specifies the feature enablement identifier for a product addon. Currently, only 'aiops' is supported.

value_schema.description: The feature enablement identifier, typically the name of the product addon. Currently only `aiops` is supported.

parameters.name: accept_version_header
parameters.description: Specifies the version of the API to use. This is used as the Accept header for versioning.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: set_content_type
parameters.description: Specifies the media type of the request body, must be 'application/json'.

parameters.name: feature_enablement_settings
parameters.description: A JSON object specifying the feature addon name, its enablement status, last update time, and any warnings. Use this to apply feature enablement settings.

feature.description: The name of the product addon whose set of features will be enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: A boolean value indicating whether the specified product addon is enabled or disabled.

updated_at.description: The time the feature enablement was last updated.

warnings.description: An array of warnings related to this feature enablement. Only present if warning conditions are met.

value_schema.description: The feature enablement setting to apply.
